document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the mite families Ascidae Voigts & Oudemans, Blattisociidae Garman and Melicharidae Hirschmann (Acari: Mesostigmata)

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE
DEPOSITORY: of
A . cetratus
: Museum of Gothenburg, Sweden ; of
A . bispinatus
,
A . halophilus
and
A . erlangensis
: not stated.

TYPE
LOCALITY AND HABITAT : of
A . cetratus
: Iceland , on vegetable debris; of
A . bispinatus : Strandkjaer
, Denmark , in soil; of
A . halophilus : Ciechocinek, Weichsel
, southeast of Thorn, Poland , from salt marsh, between roots of
Salicorniae herbacea
,
Atropis distans
and
Aster tripolium
[Plantae: Asteraceae ]; of
A . erlangensis
: according to
Sellnick, 1958
: 24 , Bavaria, Germany , on unstated substrate.

NOTES : (a)
Bernhard ( 1963 : 151 )
suspected
Laelaps ( Iphis ) semiscissus Berlese
to be a senior synonym of
L . cetratus
; (b)
Lindquist ( 1964 a
: 93 ; 1964 b: 3895 ) and
Farrier & Hennessey ( 1993 : 24 )
considered
Arctoseius limburgensis
Nesbitt, 1954
to be a junior synonym of
A . cetratus
. We adopted the interpretation of Halliday et al . ( 1998 : 16 ), considering
A . limburgensis
a junior synonym
Arctoseius semiscissus (Berlese)
.
